Intro.about: I am passionate about delivering the best user experience using the latest cutting-edge technologies, I build robust, secure, and accessible websites that are interactive and fun to use. I am familiar with back-end technologies and integrate them into my workflow. I have excellent attention to detail and deliver a product that perfectly matches the design.
Intro.name: Rashid Shamloo

TechnologyAndPassion.techText1: helps us create better user experiences
TechnologyAndPassion.techText3: implement the latest web standards, best practices, and design trends
TechnologyAndPassion.techText4: simplify and speed up the development process
TechnologyAndPassion.passionText1: help us empathize with our users, understand their needs, and deliver value
TechnologyAndPassion.passionText2: communicate effectively, collaborate productively, and build trust
TechnologyAndPassion.passionText3: add personality, emotion, and creativity to our work

Showcase.pageInfo: Most of the projects on this page are built using my own NPM packages. They demonstrate my ability to build innovative, customizable, reusable, visually stunning, and functionally robust components and applications.
Showcase.japanSliderFooter: Made using the [swiper](https://www.npmjs.com/package/swiper), [swiper-mods](https://www.npmjs.com/package/swiper-mods), and [react-next-tilt](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-next-tilt) NPM packages.
Showcase.fishFooter1: Made using the [react-flip-tilt](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-flip-tilt) and [react-next-parallax](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-next-parallax) NPM packages.
Showcase.flowersFooter1: Made using the [react-flip-tilt](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-flip-tilt) and [react-next-tilt](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-next-tilt) NPM packages.

MoreProjects.title: More Projects
MoreProjects.github: I have many more projects on my GitHub account. make sure to check it out.
MoreProjects.frontendmentor: I regularly do coding challenges on frontendmentor.io. you can see my progress over time.
